jam.data.func
Class PolynomialFunction

  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
Function
public class PolynomialFunction
extends CalibrationFunction

A polynomial function that can be use to calibrate a histogram. Most often used to define energy calibrations of spectra.

Constructor Detail

PolynomialFunction

public PolynomialFunction(int numberTerms)
                   throws DataException
Creates a new CalibrationFunction object of the specified type. If passed LINEAR, the function is a line. If passed POLYNOMIAL, it is a polynomial of order POLY_NUM_TERMS - 1.

Throws:
DataException - thrown if invalid type passed to constructor
